@Sportsnet @FAN590 Nut gut time

@simplicity71 @ShiDavidi Why are you even bringing that up? Simply speculating the outcome of the case yesterday. His lawyer even indicted months ago there would be three outcomes- trail, peace bond or conviction.I added conditional discharge because the Crown has been unwilling to accept a peace bond

@SeanBinns @EJSims_ @hallamaniac07 @LottOnBaseball @Ken_Rosenthal The fact his lawyer pushed for a peace bond from the start and wanted nothing to do with a trail.. and with the victim conveniently not cooperating that nixed the momentum towards a trial.. well. Take that however you want I guess

@ari_shapiro While people are entitled to their own opinion, the unwavering support Osuna has received by notably female supporters has shocked and disgusted me. Painting Osuna to be the victim in all of this.
RT @ari_shapiro: [Shapiroâ€™s Daily Rant]: Thoughts on Roberto Osuna and the lamentation of any real justice on the baseball diamond or underâ€¦

RT @saskyflamesfan: @ShiDavidi Pretty standard defence tactic for domestic violence. Keep putting off court appearances until enough time hâ€¦
@boarderman8 @ShiDavidi So your gut was right that the victim would flee back to Mexico and not cooperate with the Crown in prosecuting the father of her 3 year old?
@BNightengale She wouldnâ€™t return I meant to write
@BNightengale She would return for court proceedings.. and since details of the case will be locked away after signing a peace bond he can spin this any way he wants

@BNightengale Crown said the victim was unwilling to testify against Osuna or come back to Canada. And since fled back to Mexico it made going to trial difficult. Pretty convenient if you ask me. So I would hold off claiming his innocence after signing a peace bond.
@lawandchocolate @burton052 @ILOVEJESUS1986 @ShiDavidi Thatâ€™s fine. Just convenient that she is unwilling to testify, just like Reyeâ€™s wife, Chapmanâ€™s gf etc
@lawandchocolate @burton052 @ILOVEJESUS1986 @ShiDavidi I would expect nothing less from a defence lawyer :)
@burton052 @ILOVEJESUS1986 @ShiDavidi You donâ€™t sign a peace bond in a domestic assault charge if you are innocent.
@ILOVEJESUS1986 @ShiDavidi It was a plea deal. Far cry from claiming his innocence in all of this. Smh
@JustmeElc @Oz10G @ShiDavidi A peace bond is requested when evidence of a crime is committed. A plea deal requires admission of guilt in exchange for certain conditions.
@KJAK16 @Oz10G @ShiDavidi Exactly. Since she left for Mexico and he doesnâ€™t work in Canada anymore...but a conditional discharge will be on his record.
@Oz10G @ShiDavidi That being said, a peace bond is far from claiming oneâ€™s innocence in my opinion.
@Oz10G @ShiDavidi That what his lawyer has been pushing for.. Crown hasnâ€™t been willing to accept. Weâ€™ll see
@ShiDavidi Conditional discharge (admission of guilt) or a peace bond
